Mortals whose ancestry has been influenced by celestials are known as aasimars, and angelkin, who have blood of angels coursing through their veins, are among the most common type of them. Many angelkin seek adventure as a means of doing good in the world. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15 [Aasimar Redeemer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=333) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 263 **Perception** +11; darkvision **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7 **Str** +4 **Dex** +1 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +3 **Items** [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12), [Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) --- **AC** 23 (25 with shield raised) **Fort** +12 **Ref** +8 **Will** +11 +1 status to all saves vs. disease (against diseases, critical failures become failures) **HP** 73 **Divine Grace** **Trigger** The angelkin is targeted by a spell that allows a saving throw. **Effect** The scion gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the saving throw.
**Glimpse of Redemption** **Trigger** An enemy damages one of the angelkin’s allies. Both the enemy and ally must be within 15 feet of the angelkin. **Effect** The angelkin causes its foe to hesitate under the weight of its sins as visions of possible redemption play out in its mind’s eye. The foe chooses one of two options:
  • The ally is completely unharmed by the triggering damage.
  • The ally gains resistance 7 to all damage against the triggering damage. After the damaging effect resolves, the enemy becomes enfeebled 2 until the end of its next turn.
**Shield Block** --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** longsword +15 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d8+7 slashing **Ranged** crossbow +12 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d8+3 piercing plus Knockdown **Divine Innate Spells** DC 20 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171) **Champion Devotion Spells** DC 20; **3rd** (1 Focus Point) [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395)
